citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on 14 Feb
2022. The inspector was able to communicate with licensee via text message. She verified she was not available for an
inspection at that time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am on 14 Feb 
2022.  The inspector was able to communicate with licensee via text message. She verified she was not available for an 
inspection at that time. 
 
 
 
End Section
